pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dataset Shift with Outlier Scores // Test for no adverse shift in two-sample comparison when we have a training set, the reference distribution, and a test set. The approach is flexible and relies on a robust and powerful test statistic, the weighted AUC. Technical details are in Kamulete, V. M. (2021) arXiv:1908.04000. Modern notions of outlyingness such as trust scores and prediction uncertainty can be used as the underlying scores for example.
